message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $145. I believe this price reflects the value you would place on it, considering its worth to you is $150. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'd like to make you an offer of $135. This price still allows us to maintain a fair margin while being competitive with your proposed offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $132.50. Can you consider that?
